Body: Possible Duplicate:  How to change the account for Android Market?  I got on the market yesterday and it made me enter my password for my existing Google account but I had forgotten the password. I made a new one and tried to delete the old one but it wouldn't let me. I can't install apps now because I don't have the password. How can I set it to use the new account?
Title: How do I change the Gmail account associated with the Play Store?

history.Text: I got on the market yesterday and it made me put up my password for my old g mail account and i had forgotten the password. I made an new one and tried to delete the old one but it wouldn't let me. I can't get apps now because I don't have the password... PLEASE HELP
How do i change the gmail account on the android market?
